column14: I bought this scent by mistake, but figured that since it smelled ok & was labeled as moisturizing my 15 year old could use it. About a week into using it, he said that he didn’t care for the smell but it wasn’t terrible. A few days later he seemed to have eczema spots on his torso, which he hadn’t had in several years. He started treating it with a cream that works for him & it responded. About a week or so later he complained that his skin felt funny. The eczema is almost gone, but everything else is extremely dry. The only change has been this soap. He won’t be using it any longer & I will now be donating 3 unopened bottles.
